snippet: The National Assembly’s vote to join the fight was unanimous, and followed several attacks in Niger in less than a week.
abstract: Niger votes to send troops across Nigerian border to fight Boko Haram militant group; militants have made four attacks in Niger in less than week.
lead_paragraph: The National Assembly’s vote to join the fight was unanimous, and followed several attacks in Niger in less than a week.

headline.main: Niger Adds Its Troops to the War on Boko Haram
